analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.desc: Real-time statistics showing total patients, today's appointments, weekly schedules, and recent activity. Make informed decisions with data insights.

helpCenter.title: Professional User Guide
helpCenter.subtitle: Complete documentation & reference manual for DigiSpher EMR
helpCenter.introText: DigiSpher EMR is a comprehensive Electronic Medical Record system designed for solo practitioners and small clinics. This desktop application provides a complete suite of tools to manage patient records, appointments, clinical notes, prescriptions, and more.
helpCenter.changePassword: Important: Change your password immediately after first login for security.
helpCenter.forgotPasswordDesc: If you forget your password, follow this secure 3-step recovery process:
helpCenter.step1: On the login screen, click Forgot Password?
helpCenter.step3: Step 2: Enter your clinic name for authentication (must match system record exactly)
helpCenter.step4: Step 3: Enter your new password twice to confirm
helpCenter.navPatients: Navigate to Patients from the sidebar
helpCenter.fillRequired: Fill in required information (First Name, Last Name)
helpCenter.deleteWarning: Warning: Deleting a patient will also delete all associated appointments, notes, and prescriptions. This action cannot be undone!
helpCenter.selectDetails: Select patient, date, time, and reason
helpCenter.soapFormat: Notes follow the standard SOAP format:
helpCenter.exportDesc: Click View Doc then Export to PDF to generate a professional report.
helpCenter.allergyManagement: Track patient allergies to prevent adverse reactions.
helpCenter.safetyAlert: Safety Alert: Active allergies automatically appear when creating clinical notes or prescriptions!
helpCenter.vitalSignsTracking: Record BP, Heart Rate, Temp, Weight, SpO₂, etc. The system automatically calculates BMI.
helpCenter.prescriptionManagement: Create e-prescriptions and export them as professional PDFs. Ensure to fill in Medication, Dosage, Frequency, Duration, and Instructions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your Data, Your Control - Complete Privacy with On-Premise Storage
privacy.overviewText: DigiSpher EMR is fundamentally different from cloud-based EMR systems. We prioritize your privacy and data ownership by providing an on-premise solution where all patient data remains exclusively on your local computer.
privacy.keyPrincipleText: Your data never leaves your computer. DigiSpher EMR does not collect, store, transmit, or have access to any patient health information (PHI) or personal data you enter into the system.
privacy.localStorage: Local Storage Only: All patient records, clinical notes, prescriptions, and appointments are stored in a local database on your device.
privacy.noCloudTransmission: No Cloud Transmission: No patient data is transmitted to our servers or any third-party services.
privacy.noRemoteAccess: No Remote Access: We cannot access, view, or retrieve any data you store in DigiSpher EMR.
privacy.backup1: Daily backups of your DigiSpher EMR data directory
privacy.backup2: Storing backups on secure external media or encrypted cloud storage
privacy.contactUsText: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

comparison.subtitle: Compare on-premise and cloud-based electronic medical records solutions
comparison.faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about DigiSpher EMR
comparison.faq1q: Do I need internet to use DigiSpher EMR?
comparison.faq1a: No. DigiSpher EMR is fully offline and runs locally on your device. Internet is only needed for updates or support.
comparison.faq2a: Your data never leaves your device. Unlike cloud EMRs, DigiSpher EMR ensures complete privacy and control.
comparison.faq3q: What happens if I lose my computer?
comparison.faq3a: You are responsible for backups. We recommend regular local or external backups to keep your data safe.
comparison.faq4a: Yes. All future updates are free for life once you purchase the license.
comparison.faq5q: Can DigiSpher EMR handle multiple doctors in one clinic?
comparison.faq5a: It is designed for solo practitioners. For larger practices, a cloud EMR may be more suitable.
comparison.faq6a: A one-time payment of $899.40 (discounted from $1,499) until December 31, 2025. No recurring fees.
comparison.faq7a: We provide built-in documentation, password recovery, and email support for all users.
